name: Foggy Forrest
description:
My submission for #NaturesBeauty.

There is no Main menu(because game jam, and because no time :)) )

Controls:

WASD

Left click to use sword

Backspace to save/load/quit

E to interact

 Go to the villager that has a quest icon above the head, and start the quest.

Enjoy!

As tools i have been using:

Gaia Pro 2021, GeNa Pro, Ambien sounds, Pegasus, Enviro, Invector, Quest Machine, Nature Renderer, Emerald Ai, Crux Spawner.

Built with Unity 2021.1.17f1\

PS: The quest will does not work properly till the end, but just go and do it for the sake of the game!! :))
